choose.when: select b.id,b.name,b.btnName,b.functionType,queryMenuBtnParentIds(b.id)as parentId, ifnull(a.dataPermission,'on') as dataPermission,b.permissionArea,b.operatorId, a.combiPermission,b.level,b.roleGroup as groups from sys_permission a left join sys_menu b on a.menuPermission = b.id left join (select count(id) total from sys_permission where roleId=#{roleId} and userId=#{userId}) c on 1=1 where a.roleId=#{roleId} and if(c.total>0,a.userId=#{userId},true) and b.level in(3,4)
choose.otherwise: select b.id,b.name,b.btnName,b.functionType,queryMenuBtnParentIds(b.id)as parentId, ifnull(a.dataPermission,'on') as dataPermission,b.permissionArea,b.operatorId, a.combiPermission,b.level,b.roleGroup as groups from sys_permission a left join sys_menu b on a.menuPermission = b.id where b.level in(3,4) and a.roleId=#{roleId} and length(a.userId)<=0

mapper.select: select a.id,a.name,a.parentId,a.btnName,a.functionType,a.level,a.dataPerFlag from sys_menu a left join sys_role b on 1=1 where a.isvalid=1 and if(length(a.roleGroup)<=0,true,find_in_set(b.groups ,a.roleGroup)) and b.id=#{roleId}
select id,name,relationBtn,menuId from sys_permission_combination where isValid=1
mapper.delete: delete a from sys_permission a left join sys_role b on a.roleId = b.id left join (select id,name,parentId,roleGroup from sys_menu where id=#{menuId} union select b.id,b.name,b.parentId,a.roleGroup from sys_menu a left join sys_menu b on a.id = b.parentId where a.id = #{menuId}) c on a.menuPermission= c.id where (c.id=#{menuId} or c.parentId=#{menuId}) and find_in_set(b.groups,c.roleGroup)=0;
